original_text: And as the people were in expectation, and all men mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;
korean_text: 백성들이 바라고 기다리므로 모든 사람들이 요한을 혹 그리스도신가 심중에 생각하니

sentences.original_text: And as the people were in expectation
and all men mused in their hearts of John
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 마음속으로 요한에 대해 생각하며

sentences.original_text: whether he were the Christ, or not
